Package com.array64.socialCredit.api

Interface SocialCreditChangeEvent

public interface SocialCreditChangeEvent
Represents the event of the social credit score of a player changing. This can be passed to SocialCreditListeners to change the outcome of the event or to listen to the event.

    • setNewScore

      void setNewScore(int newScore) throws ScoreOutOfBoundsException
      Sets the new score of the player.
      Parameters:
      newScore - The new score of the player
      Throws:
      ScoreOutOfBoundsException - if newScore is negative or greater than the maximum social credit score.
      See Also:
      • getNewScore()

    • getOldScore

      int getOldScore()
      Returns:
      The old score of the player

    • setCancelled

      void setCancelled(boolean cancelled)
      Sets whether the event is cancelled or not. This does not stop the event from going to other SocialCreditListeners where they can be uncancelled.
      Parameters:
      cancelled - Whether the event should be cancelled or not
      See Also:
      • isCancelled()

      boolean isCancelled()
      Returns:
